name: COIN
description:
The bourgeois myth of non-commercial art has always been based on the privileged position of those who can access its tools and established circuits.
The myth of the marginal artist idealizes the martyrdom of those who die on the road and rewards them by monetizing their post-mortem work.
This coin goes to the wishing well of the working class trying / failing / succeeding to expropriate the institutions of bourgeois art.
